title: Drawing, "Apostles after Raphael's "Death of Ananias"", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Group of seven apostles based on Raphael's "The Death of Ananias."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Apostles after Raphael's "Death of Ananias"", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1934.
